synopsis.text: In a groundbreaking fusion of American rock music and anime, directors Takashi Okazaki and Junpei Mizusaki present a unique visual album. The narrative follows an enigmatic driver navigating a desolate, post-apocalyptic landscape, hurtling towards an epic confrontation with a pair of formidable adversaries. This innovative production features the collaborative efforts of multiple studios, resulting in a diverse mix of visual styles, including 2D animation, 3D animation, and live-action segments, culminating in a total of ten distinct episodes. This anime promises a thrilling, immersive experience that redefines the boundaries of storytelling.
